content: X-DS Steel/concrete nails Universal fasteners for concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features High application limits, high ultimate tensile loads Wide nail shank makes this fastener extremely buckle-resistant 10 mm plastic washer for excellent guidance on tough concrete Applications Fastening perimeter wall track Universal fastenings on concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 1/4 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick) | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 1/4 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.18 in | Point type | Ballistic point | Approvals | ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | DX 5, DX 6, DX 76 ### ITEMS- 3496947 -
